main

Class HeldBlockManager

  • java.lang.Object
    • main.HeldBlockManager

  • public class HeldBlockManager
extends java.lang.Object
    Maneuvers the claw and keeps track of the number of blocks being held.
    Author:

    • Constructor Detail

      • HeldBlockManager

        Constructor.

    • Method Detail

      • initializeClaw

        public void initializeClaw()
        Initializes the claw system by raising the pulley and closing the claw.

      • raisePulley

        public void raisePulley()
        Raises the pulley until reaches the claw reaches the top position.

      • captureBlock

        public void captureBlock()
        Captures a block positioned below the claw. This assumes the claw is already in a raised position.

      • releaseBlock

        public void releaseBlock()
        Drops all held blocks.

      • rotateUntilStall

        public static void rotateUntilStall(EV3LargeRegulatedMotor motor,
                    boolean forward,
                    int threshold)
        Rotates a motor until it stops rotating because it is blocked.
        Parameters:
        motor - the motor to rotate.
        forward - indicates the direction the motor is rotated in.
        threshold - the amount the motor must move between checks to be considered not stalled.

      • getBlockCount

        public int getBlockCount()
        Returns:
        the number of blocks held by the claw.
